meanings.definition: A substance that adds iodine to something.
meanings.sent1: The iodizers in the salt help keep our bodies healthy.
meanings.sent2: I bought iodizers to make sure my diet has enough iodine.
meanings.sent3: The iodizers in the medicine made it taste like the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was like an iodizer, adding flavor to every dish.
meanings.sent5: The iodizers glowed in the dark, making them easy to find.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that iodizes.
meanings.sent1: The iodizers at the factory work hard to ensure proper iodine levels.
meanings.sent2: The iodizers in the lab carefully measure the iodine content.
meanings.sent3: The iodizers in the kitchen danced around, sprinkling iodine everywhere.
meanings.sent4: He was like an iodizer, spreading positivity wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The iodizers hummed a tune as they iodized the water.

meanings.definition: The process of adding iodine to something.
meanings.sent1: The iodizers improved the health benefits of the food.
meanings.sent2: I learned about iodizers during the iodine enrichment process.
meanings.sent3: The iodizers in the experiment bubbled with excitement as iodine was added.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an iodizer, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The iodizers flowed smoothly, evenly distributing iodine.
